summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Mall Area Redevelopment TIF District Board of Directors is holding a special called meeting on March 17, 2025, at 4:00 p.m. at Dallas City Hall and via videoconference. The purpose of the meeting is to discuss key agenda items related to the redevelopment of the Mall Area and to make decisions regarding funding and project approvals.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Review and approval of the Meeting Record from the April 29, 2024 meeting.
2. Presentation of the Mall Area Redevelopment TIF District Annual Report for FY 2023-2024 (informational only).
3. Consideration of a funding proposal for the acquisition of land for a future central park in the Valley View-Galleria area.
4. Establishment of a regular meeting schedule for the Board for 2025.

**Important Details**:  
The Board will consider an expenditure of up to $1,829,328 from the TIF District Fund, supplemented by $9,480,672 from the 2024 Bond Fund, for the acquisition of approximately 79,916 square feet of land at Montfort Drive. This acquisition is part of the Cityâ€™s Valley View-Galleria Area Plan and aims to enhance public assembly spaces in the area.

**Action Items**:  
The Board is seeking approval for the meeting record, the funding proposal for land acquisition, and the regular meeting schedule for 2025. These approvals will be forwarded to the City Council for final consideration. Public comments will also be taken into account during the meeting.
